DataElement.preferredName: Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Relationship Death Main Reason Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the main cause of death was HCT related.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Relationship Death Main Reason
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual._A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._The absence of life or state of being dead._Most important; principal._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Relationship Death
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual.:Related; connected or associated.:The absence of life or state of being dead.

Concepts.definition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Most important; principal.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

Concepts.definition: An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:2768639
ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedMedicalConditionResult [death] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation [primary etiology] > PerformedClinicalInterpretation.value(ANY=>DSET<CD>).item(CD).code WHERE  PerformedMedicalConditionResult.value = "death" AND AssessedResultRelationship.typeCode = "primary etiology" AND PerformedSubstanceAdministration.dateRange [transplant] IS LESS THAN PerformedObservation.dateRange [post-HSCT condition identifcation] AND PerformedObservation.dateRange [post-HSCT condition identifcation] IS LESS THAN PerformedMedicalConditionResult.occurrenceDateRange [death] AND PerformedObservation.dateRange [post-HSCT condition identifcation] > PerformedObservationResult [post-HSCT condition] AND PerformedSubstanceAdministration > DefinedSubstanceAdministration.nameCode = "Administer Hematopoietic Stem Cell Product{transplantation}"
